ing: 1 (46 fluid ounce) can pineapple juice (such as DoleÂ®)
1 (2 liter) bottle fruit punch (such as Hawaiian PunchÂ®)
des: "People won't believe it when you tell them what is in this simple sangria. We served it at our wedding and everyone loved it -- hence the name 'Wedding Sangria.'"
ins: Mix together the rose and burgundy wine, pineapple juice, and fruit punch in a punch bowl or large container. Add the lemon, lime and orange juices. Float the lemon, lime and orange slices in the punch for a garnish. Serve chilled.
